description:
This market refers to the Call of Duty match between Vancouver Surge and Los Angeles Thieves in the Call of Duty League Stage 2 Major Qualifiers Qualifiers, scheduled for February 14 at 7:30PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Vancouver Surge" if Vancouver Surge win the match against Los Angeles Thieves.

This market will resolve to "Los Angeles Thieves" if Los Angeles Thieves win the match against Vancouver Surge.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/callofduty/Main_Page.

markets.description:
This market refers to the Call of Duty match between Vancouver Surge and Los Angeles Thieves in the Call of Duty League Stage 2 Major Qualifiers Qualifiers, scheduled for February 14 at 7:30PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Over" if Vancouver Surge and Los Angeles Thieves play 4 or more games in this series.

If fewer than 4 games are played, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.
